channel.title: Need help! =[
channel.description: hi im wondering how to give npc's health? please tell me

item.title: Need help! =[
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Ok first go into npc.cfg and you will see somthing like this:

npc = 10	Guard				22	22

The first “npc = 10” is telling the npchandler to receive information on npc 10 (guard). The “Guard” is just the name of the npc (cant change it in game by change this). The first “22” is telling the npc’s combat level (dont change this). And the second “22” is the npc’s health (change this to whatever you want!). I hope this helped. Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic
